summary: Completed testing of Mon Entrepôt Pro feature and CreateListing bug fix. All warehouse APIs working correctly. Fixed a frontend bug in filters panel (empty string value in Select component). CreateListing page works correctly via /deposer route.

ui_bugs.issue: SelectItem with empty string value causing runtime error - FIXED

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/warehouse/stats - returns correct stats (total_items, total_sections, total_stock, stock_value, low_stock_count)
Backend: POST /api/warehouse/sections - creates new section successfully
Backend: POST /api/warehouse/items - creates new item successfully
Backend: POST /api/listings - creates listing with all required fields (bug fix verified)
Frontend: Warehouse page loads correctly with stats displayed
Frontend: Stock adjustment +/- buttons work with toast notifications
Frontend: Filters panel works after fix
Frontend: CreateListing page loads correctly via /deposer route (no white page)
critical_code_review_comments: Warehouse.jsx line 657: Fixed SelectItem with empty string value - changed to use 'all' value and convert in onValueChange handler
CreateListing route is /deposer not /deposer-annonce - this is correct behavior
All warehouse backend endpoints use async/await correctly with MongoDB
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up: TEST_Section_Pytest, TEST_Item_Pytest, TEST_Listing_Pytest
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mon Entrepôt Pro feature fully tested and working. All warehouse CRUD operations work correctly. CreateListing bug fix verified - the ListingResponse model now includes all required fields. Fixed a minor frontend bug in Warehouse.jsx filters panel where SelectItem had empty string value. Admin credentials: contact@worldautofrance.com / Admin123!
